name: OtodoOne
0:
”Alexa, turn on light.”
”Alexa, activate Back home.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Otodo's solution consists of a multi-protocol hub, a mobile application and a cloud platform. The multi-protocol hub connects different types of objects (lamps, sockets, shutters, thermostats), different protocols and brands. The Otodo one application allows you to name these objects and assign them a location. 
Thanks to Alexa, the user orders the objects that are connected to the Otodo hub, and runs the scenarios including these objects, all in accordance with the context of the house described through the Otodo application.
This context is transferred to Alexa, once the Otodo skill has been downloaded and initialized with the login/password of the Otodo account.
